question: A melee attack with one handed warhammer is made by a character with +3 strength. What is the damage?

rules: Combat > Making an Attack > Attack Rolls > Modifiers to the Roll > Ability Modifier
rules_explanation: The warhammer is a versatile weapon that does 1d8 bludgeoning damage when used in one hand. Since the character makes a melee attack, their strength bonus is added to the damage.
